action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

sudo yum install -y jre

sudo groupadd -r wildfly
sudo useradd -r -g wildfly -d /opt/wildfly -s /sbin/nologin wildfly

curl -O http://download.jboss.org/wildfly/11.0.0.Final/wildfly-11.0.0.Final.tar.gz

sudo tar xvzf /home/centos/wildfly-11.0.0.Final.tar.gz -C /opt
sudo ln -s /opt/wildfly-11.0.0.Final /opt/wildfly

sudo chown -R wildfly:wildfly /opt/wildfly*

sudo mkdir /etc/wildfly
sudo cp /opt/wildfly/docs/contrib/scripts/systemd/wildfly.conf /etc/wildfly/
sudo cp /opt/wildfly/docs/contrib/scripts/systemd/wildfly.service /etc/systemd/system/
sudo cp /opt/wildfly/docs/contrib/scripts/systemd/launch.sh /opt/wildfly/bin/
sudo chmod +x /opt/wildfly/bin/launch.sh


sudo sed -i "s/127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0/g" /opt/wildfly/standalone/configuration/standalone.xml

sudo /opt/wildfly/bin/add-user.sh -u admin -p @@{ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@


sudo systemctl enable wildfly
sudo systemctl start wildfly


#clean stuff
sudo rm wildfly-11.0.0.Final.tar.gz

#!/bin/bash

curl -LO @@{DEMO_APPS}@@
sudo mv `basename @@{DEMO_APPS}@@` /opt/wildfly/standalone/deployments/
echo "application installed at URL => http://@@{address}@@:8080/"`basename @@{DEMO_APPS}@@ .war`

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
